meanings.definition: A machine for shaping wood, metal, or other material by means of a rotating drive which turns the piece being worked on against changeable cutting tools.
meanings.sent1: The lathes in the workshop are used to shape metal parts.
meanings.sent2: He operated the lathes in the factory to create precise components.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat accidentally turned on the lathe, creating a mess in the workshop.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a lathe, constantly shaping new ideas and innovations.
meanings.sent5: The loud hum of the lathe filled the room as it worked on the piece of wood.

meanings.definition: A thin, narrow strip of wood used in building.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter measured and cut the lathes for the construction project.
meanings.sent2: The lathes were nailed to the frame to provide support for the plaster.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the lathes to build a tiny treehouse.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like lathes, carefully constructing a strong argument.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze caused the lathes to sway slightly in the wind.
